Name: Malkhaz
description: Malkhaz is a 46-year-old married man and lives with his grown son, daughter-in-law, grandson and retired father. Malkhazâ€™s wife works in Italy and sends a small amount of money to her family members. Malkhaz runs small scale agricultural business and owns a dairy cow whose milk is used in cheese products. He has a small vineyard and sells the harvested grapes seasonally. The existing funds are not enough for the family of five.  In order to generate more income, Malkhaz decided to purchase a second-hand car to use it as Taxi. He is an experienced and careful driver and hopes his initiative will be successful. A loan of $ 3,600 will help him to start a Taxi business. Malkhaz is a very enthusiastic and hard working person with a great desire to ensure his family members with better living conditions.
